name: Phaze
description:
A small puzzle platformer completed during the Winter Jam 2018. Phaze is about a a small purple creature with the ability to switch between the past and the present in order to retrieve magic hourglass sand.

Phaze was developped by:

-Rodrigo Sclavi

-German Cedres

-Milagros Arrieta

-Sofia Caponnetto

-Sofia Rey

-Ismael Serrada
